name: Mending Good Simulator 64 Definitive League of Legends Edition
name_original: Mending Good Simulator 64 Definitive League of Legends Edition
description: "Jebby! It's time to cook." Bolster Beige needs your help Jebby! Control Jebby Lincoln's left arm to push buttons and twist the right knobs to create bottled salt water, Mend Good!
